name: Talksoft
overview:
Talksoft automated payment and appointment reminder service — email, text messaging, reminder call service and voice broadcast, and now Talksoft Connect Appointment Reminder App — can improve your customer relationships, build retention, improve office efficiency, and reduce operating expenses.

Our products have no commitments to long-term subscription contracts, no hidden charges, and no computer hardware purchases. Our subscribers pay only a usage-based fee. Our service-based approach allows us to provide affordable solutions for businesses of any size by harnessing technologies once available only to large companies in niche markets.

Businesses use reminders effectively to increase the number of fulfilled appointments and, therefore, their profitability. Telephoning and generating postcards consumes valuable staff time. RemindMe eliminates this drain on staff resources. RemindMe has the ability to make customers aware of their upcoming appointments in the form of phone, email, mobile app, and text reminders.

Talksoft’s service offerings have one common theme - to enable businesses to more efficiently communicate with their customers in an affordable way. Talksoft’s suite of services scale to businesses of any size, from a small, part-time doctor’s office to larger institutions.
